help0.title: Minigues German is bad, nothing he says makes sense
help0.text: Minigue is still new to German and chatting in English will make it easier for both of you ;)

help1.title: MiniguePT randomly started speaking German
help1.text: Like the creator, MiniguePT seems to be somewhat bilingual. If you keep using English, it’ll switch back quickly.

help2.title: MiniguePTs replies are nonsensical and/or it only replies to itself
help2.text: It’s best to just delete Minigues reply and your question and then ask again, worded differently!

help3.title: I found some quirk in MiniguePT
help3.text: Feel free to share it! We’d be very happy to hear about it. Either message us on GitHub or via direct message.

help4.title: What are you doing with my chat inputs?
help4.text: Except for generating a response from MiniguePT - nothing. We have no idea what you are messaging the bot and we don't care either.
